original_text: My Christian friends, you know about Stephanas and his family. They were the first people in Achaia to become Christians. They have worked hard as God's servants to help his people. So I say this to you.
korean_text: 형제들아 스데바나의 집은 곧 아가야의 첫 열매요 또 성도 섬기기로 작정한 줄을 너희가 아는지라 내가 너희를 권하노니

sentences.original_text: you know about Stephanas and his family
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 스테파나와 그의 가족에 대해 안다

sentences.original_text: They were the first people in Achaia
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아가야 지역의 첫 번째 사람들이었다

sentences.original_text: So I say this to you
